item.title: OpEn on Raspberry Pi
item.description: Here we give an example of building a parametric optimizer in MATLAB, which will run on a Raspberry Pi. The parametric optimizer will listen for requests on a UDP socket. We will then establish a connection to the optimizer, remotely, and consume the service.
